name: DIVIDE BY ZERO
description:
Play as Timmy the game developer, his bugs have scaped in to reality, kill them and save the world!
The game is extremely un-balanced and probably a bit buggy towards the end of the game!
Game features:

  • 10 different levels
  • 100 waves of increasingly difficult enemies
  • 6 upgradeable stats

I hope that you enjoy it, even in this extremely unforgiving state!
